page.title: 04A Pensioner's day,Paulton.
page.content: Mr B. leads a very busy life.He gets up at 7.30am.He has breakfast about 7.45am.For breakfast he has cereals,a piece of toast with Jam and butter and a drink. On Saturday he plays bowls with Purnells team. Mr B.likes playing against other teams. For dinner he likes a roast with plenty of vegetables. During the day he may go to a committee because he is an active member of three or four committees in the village. Then he might have a game of whist which he likes playing a lot. Mr B.is a teetotaller, that is he drinks lemonade or tea and coffee. He goes to church as well,but that is on Sunday morning.
